@iceblueaccent My reading of that is medical and recreational cannabis are identical (could be same product from same producer) differences are paperwork and price.
@iceblueaccent There’s this https://t.co/4jfgDjeAo4 which is interesting state by state, if you find anything else comparing medical vs recreational cannabis please post it.
@BernadetteNTF Link missed was to https://t.co/4jfgDjeAo4

@BLeeLoganberg I have several friends, one with MS, one who died of brain cancer, for whom medical cannabis is/was essential. Just saying there appears to be no difference between products sold as medical vs recreational except for THC/CBD ratios. Hence curious about Shoppers license #bchealth
Oops, here’s link I missed: https://t.co/4jfgDjeAo4 #bcpoli #cbc #bchealth https://t.co/RdgFJUZynI

@BLeeLoganberg Hope that’s eventually true but there’s very little research today that would allow anyone to offer informed comment on THC/CBD ratios and doses let alone on drug interactions. I think retail pharma has seen a profit centre. #bchealth
If this site is correct difference between medical and recreational cannabis is all about taxes on identical products. #bcpoli #cbc #bchealth
